phrases: I have not played for a while, so I can hardly keep up.
Now I am just a burden...
Hey, you are in my way.
I have got a low level matter of high importance to discuss with you.
I finished making a uniform for our Society.
I told you I got rid of all that crap already.
It is just a game, all right?!
The Priestess is home for you.
It is July already, is not it?
I get that I am the only one who even sort of understands what is going on in your head,
but would it kill you to at least try speaking with others?
I talk with Dekomori, Kumin and Nibutani as well.
That is true, but how about some more people?
You only talk with me, Nibutani and Isshiki in class too.
We are not even close to being the same!
I do not like wasting time with pointless chatter, anyway.
Maybe I should just leave her be.
In this dimension, they are the only ones who acknowledge my existence.
Togashi, you are not half bad!
That picture of Takanashi looks really cute!
I drew lots during my dark days...
Released on the verge of death, the mighty Dark Flame!
I should not speak of it aloud, but the Dark Flame is Yuuta's most powerful sorcery.
Never let your guard down or you will face death, fake Forest Summer!
Is not this what you have been waiting for all this time?
What are you panicking about now?
I-I never thought I would really get one...
You are not the moe character here!
But it must be because of the guitar, right?
Which means she appreciated my musicianship, right?
But I can hardly play at all yet!
You can start by getting off of me!
I got to play minors, right?
Where did you get that from?
Question 1: Is it really a love letter?
Question 2: Are you sure it is not just a prank by the guys?
Just look at this cute handwriting!
This Saturday after class, I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
Question 3: Could it be a girl and a boy in cahoots?
How can you distrust people so much?
Who do you think it is from?
The letter's signed a classmate and there is no other name.
I cannot imagine any of them doing this.
You know, every time our eyes meet she always smiles at me!
She is so serious and tidy too!
So she must be drawn to the wildness of a rocker...
There is no way it would be her!
C-Could it be that you and Nibutani...
You two would never get along.
Anyway, I want to find out who sent me this love letter!
Even if I asked directly, they would not tell me.
Cannot you just look forward happily to the big day?
Do you really think I could just interact normally right off the bat with a girl I just met?!
Ten to one I will screw up out of anxiety!
How can you be so confident about your lack of confidence?!
I can feel the powers of oblivion descend at my call!
I doubt they would know anything about it.
When you wear this, you must introduce yourself properly.
Wielder of the Wicked Eye, Member Number Zero of the Society,
Servant of the Wicked Eye, wielder of the Mjolnir Maul,
Member Number Nil of the Society, Dekomori Sanae!
Night Sister of Melodies, Member Number Nought of the Society,
I cannot possibly imagine any other number!
I do not really get it, but I guess it is cool!
We shall decide who is most worthy of bearing the number zero!
That is death metal to my ears!
Why do you play along with their games?
But come on, what are you wearing under your shirt?
You came to meet your death?
I guess you lack the brains to understand anything but force.
I warmed it so that you can fully enjoy its taste and body.
Oh wait, I am a creature of darkness now...
Not a single damn was given!
In the name of death, stop!
Cannot you see I am busy?!
I just needed to talk to Yuuta for a sec...
You caught me off guard there...
Your vile white water is no more!
Bear witness, fake Forest Summer, and despair as you face the limitless power of my Death Drive!
Mabinogion's Rainbow Manuscript, Chapter Three, Verse One.
When the whispers of the spirits, and the dreams of light and water reach our hearts,
a world of ivory whiteness opens up to us.
I, who have been watching over this world for more than four centuries, alone understand.
That which this world needs most is...
You really are a mere fake.
The words of the true being devastate you mentally!
If you even think of telling anyone in class what you just saw...
I will place a deadly curse upon you.
No, I would say this really was written by a girl.
Do you know who wrote it?
Do you think it could be love at first sight?
You seriously consider that a possibility?
Anyway, what you choose to do from now on will decide how all this goes.
And I hope you already forgot what you saw today.
I will do what it takes.
Between now and Saturday I will simulate how it could go with all the girls in class,
so that I will know what to do no matter who it is!
I already got intel on all the girls from the guys during the cutie poll!
But I must use that time well, so I am taking this train!
I felt a great disturbance in the air.
So if what is written in this notebook found by Inomata is true,
then the boys of this class have arbitrarily ranked the girls.
By the bench at the station yesterday?
But they do not yet know whose it is.
I want to ask the boys about this.
Do you participate in polls such as this?
I do not remember anything of the sort!
It is only a matter of time now until they find out I was behind it all.
And then my newfound love will be over before it began...
I got to think of something!
Um, should not you ask Togashi?
He is a class rep, after all!
I wrote the notes you found.
There was no kind of poll amongst the class.
I just wrote it by myself!
It was a joke that went too far.
This has nothing to do with the other guys!
Is that really something he should be applauded for?
So you did this all by yourself, Isshiki?
But I cannot change the fact that it was found, nor the offense it caused.
At this point, I have no choice but to...
shave my head as an apology!
Yeah, I do not think that is necessary...
That is how men set things right.
My take all the blame and look cool plan.
Not to mention the bonds of brotherhood that were forged from me covering for you all!
The point was just to show I was ready to go that far.
But you said that was how you would set things right.
Yeah, but they will not really expect me to
Let me make this clear: the girls still doubt you.
Whatever you said, you cannot seriously expect us to just believe it like that.
Not until you really set things right.
I will ask one last time: are you really okay with this?
I finally grew this mane after enduring a crew cut for three years in junior high!
How could anything about this be okay?!
Then tomorrow you would better get down on your knees and beg them to spare your hair!
But then I would be just a loser!
If I do not set this straight,
all the girls, including the sender of that love letter, will think I am a loser!
Not to mention that if I change my mind,
they will start to suspect you guys again too!
That is how men roll, right?!
This is the stronghold of our Society.
We will be done in a moment!
I am glad I talked to you on the first day.
My dad went bald when he turned 35, you see.
Judging from my genes, I barely have 20 years left to enjoy my hair.
I lost three years already thanks to that crew cut,
and now it is come to this again.
Hurry up and put an end to this ordeal!
Please try and cheer him up somehow!
I will bestow some mana upon him.
I do not really get it, but sure, leave it to us!
But first, I must warn you...
Did you listen to a word I said?!
I wish to empower your courage.
O powers of Oblivion gathered at this unholy occasion!
By my name, I order you to bless this man!
He is so full of magic!
And thus the case of the cutie poll was finally closed.
Do not you have an ounce of compassion?!
And on that fateful Saturday, betting on what little chance he still had,
he waited under the tree for the girl who sent the love letter...
Isshiki was met with the madly devoted support of all the boys in class.
So the sender of the letter did not show up in the end?
Nibutani, do you really have no idea who it could have been?
What could you do even if I did?
But still, you gave up your precious locks to protect the other guys.
That kind of determination is actually pretty cool.
And I think there might be girls who think so.
Are you making fun of me?!
I just could not help myself.
Please, Isshiki, let me touch it!
Summer vacation's right around the corner.
Hey, Yuuta, what do you say?
Dad cannot make it home this year,
so it looks like we are going to Jakarta!
Sure, I will think about it!
I have a request for you.
Come with Rikka on our summer vacation.
We looked into each other's eyes for a while
We looked into each other's eyes for a while
sorasu made ni nani wo kangaeteta no?
What did you think of while it lasted?
sorasu made ni nani wo kangaeteta no?
What did you think of while it lasted?
Look at me as I now pout my lips
dou shita no tte kiite kuru no?
Will you ask me what is wrong?
I am embarrassed by what I mutter after
being so evasive, so please do not pay it any attention
I have dreamed of our meeting so often
I have dreamed of our meeting so often
I have dreamed of our meeting so often
I have dreamed of our meeting so often
And still I want to see you
And still I want to see you
And still I want to see you
And still I want to see you
And still I want to see you
And still I want to see you
koi ga yokubari da ne Love is greedy
koi ga yokubari da ne Love is greedy
My heart seems to hop with glee
So I will let it guide me
So I will let it guide me
So I will let it guide me
So I will let it guide me
risou mo mousou mo genjitsu mo
subete kimi wo jiku ni mawaru
dare ga nanto iou to tadashisa nante wakannai ze
nande daremo wakatte kunnai no to
omou no wa zeitaku nano kana nano kana
Getting it wrong is a shame?
Whatever people say, they do not know what is right
The boring river of time flows on
When the stars tried to fit in
They ended up sinking into it
So chew them, swallow them, and spit them out!
That is what I want to say, but I cannot
Is it selfish to think that?
The emotional Sun in the sky
Of course I want to shout
dare ga nanto iou to tadashisa nante wakannai ze
nande daremo wakatte kunnai no to
omou no wa zeitaku nano kana nano kana
Getting it wrong is a shame?
Whatever people say, they do not know what is right
The boring river of time flows on
When the stars tried to fit in
They ended up sinking into it
So chew them, swallow them, and spit them out!
That is what I want to say, but I cannot
Is it selfish to think that?
The emotional Sun in the sky
Of course I want to shout
You cannot escape me in the darkness!
This Saturd ay a fter cl ass,
I will be waitin g under the ginkgo tree.
I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
I will be waiting under the ginkgo tree.
